description: Signals a UI component (like the action buttons renderer) to update the display of currently available player actions based on the provided list.

payloadSchema.title: UIUpdateActionsPayload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload for the 'textUI:update_available_actions' event, containing the list of available action commands.

actions.description: An array of action command strings available to the player. These are typically displayed as buttons or links.

items.description: A single action command string (e.g., 'look', 'take sword', 'go north').
items.$comment: minLength ensures non-empty strings, aligning with the renderer's trim check.
